name: adesoft-pedidos-mysql
description: Root package for managing both frontend and backend

scripts.install-all: npm install --omit=dev && cd backend && npm install --omit=dev && cd ../frontend && npm install --omit=dev
scripts.dev: npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npx expo start"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm install --omit=dev && npm run build
